title: Miley Cyrus | The Right's Embrace of Racist Replacement Theory Is Both Dangerous and Dumb: A Closer Look
description:
Seth addresses the mass shooting in Buffalo, New York, before Amber Ruffin calls for an end to white supremacy and racism with a song.

Then, Seth takes a closer look at prominent members of the right embracing and parroting the dangerous white nationalist conspiracy theory known as “the great replacement,” which, in addition to being deeply racist, bigoted and dehumanizing, is incredibly stupid.

Finally, Miley Cyrus talks about her live album, the Happy Hippie Foundation and working with Lorne Michaels and Pete Davidson on her New Year's Eve special.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
